Body:
cov = np.dot(cov_sqrt, cov_sqrt.T)
L = np.linalg.cholesky(cov)
gp_result = logdensities.multivariate_normal(x, mu, L)
if mu.shape[1] > 1:
    if x.shape[1] > 1:
        sp_result = [mvn.logpdf(x[:, (i)], mu[:, (i)], cov) for i in range(
            mu.shape[1])]
    else:
        sp_result = [mvn.logpdf(x.ravel(), mu[:, (i)], cov) for i in range(
            mu.shape[1])]
else:
    sp_result = mvn.logpdf(x.T, mu.ravel(), cov)
assert_allclose(gp_result, sp_result)
pytest.mark.parametrize('x', [randn(4, 10), randn(4, 1)])pytest.mark.parametrize('mu', [randn(4, 10), randn(4, 1)])pytest.mark.parametrize('cov_sqrt', [randn(4, 4), np.eye(4)])
